REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f2781 reute r f BC-FORUM-<FOUR>-ENDS-BEV 03-16 0047

TEXT.TITLE: FORUM <FOUR> ENDS BEVERLY <BEV> PURCHASE DEAL
TEXT.BODY: Forum Group Inc said it has terminated its agreement in principle to buy eight retirement living centers in six states from Beverly Enterprises due to a failure to reach a satisfacotry definitive agreement. Reuter
